name: Basic
description: Try out our basic features at no cost. Perfect for getting started or creating short, simple summaries.
perks: Registration and login required for all services

name: Gold
description: Level up your productivity with more transcriptions, audio creations, and limited video creation.
perks: 5 video creations with 3 up to retries each

name: Diamond
description: Go all-in with unlimited features and extended video capabilities for serious content creators.
perks: 20 video creations with 5 up to retries each
